title: Did a man from Iowa get 16 years in prison for burning rainbow flags of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people?
subtitle: In December 2019, many news reports failed to properly explain to readers the impact of the laws of "normal offenders" on prison sentences.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 2019, Ames, Iowa, the man was sentenced to 16 years ' imprisonment for burning the rainbow flag of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons.
